entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
